syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Economics

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Characteristics of countries at different levels of development

learning_objectives.description: population growth and structure: measurement and causes of changes in birth rate, death rate, infant mortality and net migration, optimum population, level of urbanisation
income distribution: calculation of Gini coefficient and Lorenz curve analysis
economic structure: employment composition: primary, secondary and tertiary sectors, pattern of trade at different levels of development
